startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Feet together. Hands besides the buttocks. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Bend the right knee and gently place the foot on the left thigh such that the ankle is far enough over the thigh to be free for rotation.
Hold the right ankle with the right hand, hold the toes of the right foot with the left hand.
Slowly rotate the right foot clockwise with the help of left hand for 5 times.
Slowly rotate the right foot anti-clockwise with the help of left hand for 5 times.
Bend the left knee and gently place the foot on the right thigh such that the ankle is far enough over the thigh to be free for rotation.
Hold the left ankle with the left hand, hold the toes of the left foot with the right hand.
Slowly rotate the left foot clockwise with the help of right hand for 5 times.
Slowly rotate the left foot anti-clockwise with the help of right hand for 5 times.
